entries.title: Bosses say they're serious about cybersecurity. It's time for them to prove it
entries.description: Business leaders claim that cybersecurity skills are a top priority, but their actions often suggest otherwise.

entries.title: Nomad Apple Watch Ultra bands: Waterproof bands a rugged as the watch
entries.description: The Apple Watch Ultra was designed for extreme outdoor adventures and Nomad has bands built to match this durability that are much more affordable than band options from Apple.

entries.title: The ultimate TV gift guide: Top TVs to give away in 2022
entries.description: If you're looking to splurge on a new television for a family member or friend, check these TVs to match your picture with your price point.

entries.title: The best tablets to gift in 2022: Holiday gift guide
entries.description: Finding the perfect tablet to give as a gift this holiday season can be daunting with so many options available. I've found the best 12 gift ideas so you don't have to.

entries.title: This is what remote workers say they really want (no, it's not micromanaging)
entries.description: Those who are studying remote work believe there's been a fundamental shift. A shift of employee needs with respect to management.

entries.title: American Airlines thinks it knows what customers want (Delta and United don't agree)
entries.description: When companies decide on technology, how much do they think about customers? And how much is it all about money?

entries.title: The 5 best instant cameras of 2022
entries.description: Instant cameras may not be new gadgets, but they are becoming more modernized with selfie modes, Bluetooth capabilities, apps, and the use of filters. Polaroid Now+ is our top pick due to its fun app, filters, and vintage film experience. It's time to have actual photos in your hand again to showcase your memories in a classic way.
